review: Chromecast always needs to be connected to Wi-Fi even if you are 'Casting' an image from phone that already has a mobile connection. That makes no sense. If I have a smart TV, an internet connection, and a mobile device that can connect directly to my TV, then what is the advantage of having a Chromecast with a weak Wi-Fi attenna?!?
